main event: Military personnel reported a radar sighting of a single unidentified object near Adana, Turkey on June 8, 1965.
interesting points: The radar operators tracked the object for approximately 10 minutes,The object made a 720-degree turn while being observed,No visual correlations were made with radar returns at the same time,The object's angular size was about 1.5 degrees, which surpassed the radar's scope limit,Insufficient data led to the conclusion that the radar returns might be caused by transmitting aircraft.
sighted object: one unidentified object tracked on radar
